name: seitelite
description: Build lightweight websites easily with SiteLite.

scripts.build: node tools/purge.js && npm-run-all build:dts build:ts build:els && node tools/minify.js
scripts.watch: node tools/purge.js && npm-run-all --parallel watch:dts watch:ts watch:els
scripts.purge: rm -rf node_modules/ build/ public/dist package-lock.json pnpm-lock.yaml yarn.lock
